sqlMap.sql: delete from LNSRPYINFO where ACCTNO = :acctno and REPAYTERM = :repayterm and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and TRANDATE = :trandate and SEQNO = :seqno

insert into LNSRPYINFO (ACCTNO, REPAYTERM, ACCTSTAT, TRANDATE, SEQNO, BRC, PROFITBRC, DIACCT, CCY, TRANAMT, FLAG, LOANTYPE1, LOANTYPE2, LOANTYPE3, RPYFLAG, REPAYAMT, NORETAMT, BDATE, EDATE, EXECURATE) values (:acctno, :repayterm, :acctstat, :trandate, :seqno, :brc, :profitbrc, :diacct, :ccy, :tranamt, :flag, :loantype1, :loantype2, :loantype3, :rpyflag, :repayamt, :noretamt, :bdate, :edate, :execurate)

update LNSRPYINFO set BRC = :brc, PROFITBRC = :profitbrc, DIACCT = :diacct, CCY = :ccy, TRANAMT = :tranamt, FLAG = :flag, LOANTYPE1 = :loantype1, LOANTYPE2 = :loantype2, LOANTYPE3 = :loantype3, RPYFLAG = :rpyflag, REPAYAMT = :repayamt, NORETAMT = :noretamt, BDATE = :bdate, EDATE = :edate, EXECURATE = :execurate where ACCTNO = :acctno and REPAYTERM = :repayterm and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and TRANDATE = :trandate and SEQNO = :seqno

select ACCTNO, REPAYTERM, ACCTSTAT, TRANDATE, SEQNO, BRC, PROFITBRC, DIACCT, CCY, TRANAMT, FLAG, LOANTYPE1, LOANTYPE2, LOANTYPE3, RPYFLAG, REPAYAMT, NORETAMT, BDATE, EDATE, EXECURATE from LNSRPYINFO where ACCTNO = :acctno and REPAYTERM = :repayterm and ACCTSTAT = :acctstat and TRANDATE = :trandate and SEQNO = :seqno
